Class tripleplay.ui.MenuHost

Removed Methods
Slot<Pop> onPopup() Directs a menu pop signal to .popup(Pop).
 

Added Methods
TriggerPoint absolute(float, float) Gets a fixed trigger point for the given screen coordinates.
Pop activePop()  
void deactivate() Deactivates the current menu, if any is showing.
IRectangle getScreenArea() Gets the area to which menus should be confined when there isn't any other associated bounds.
TriggerPoint pointer() Gets a trigger point exactly under the pointer position.
TriggerPoint relative(BoxPoint) Gets a trigger point relative to an element using the given box point.
void setScreenArea(IRectangle) Sets the area to which menus should be confined when there isn't any other associated bounds.
 

Added Fields
Style<BoxPoint> POPUP_ORIGIN The point on the menu that should be placed directly on top of the trigger point, subject to bounding constraints.
Style<TriggerPoint> TRIGGER_POINT The point on an element where menus should be placed, subject to boundary constraints.
